amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that, in any proceeding to prevent or remedy a taking, the burden is on the State or agency seeking to take property to show that it is not for economic development as defined in the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-266 to clarify that in any proceeding to prevent or remedy a taking, the burden is on the state or agency to show that it is not for economic development as defined in the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sodrel amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
